settings.title: Quality is our priority
settings.text: We are always on the lookout for new styles and trends in home decor and excited to offer our clients something new and unique. We use only the best quality florals and materials. Though most of our materials come from overseas, from the USA and Europe, all our designs are hand-made by our talented in-house floral designers in our Frankston-based studio here in Victoria, Australia. Please follow us on Facebook and Instagram to get the latest information on our products and offers.

settings.title: Handmade Product Disclaimer
settings.text: Please note that due to the handmade nature of our products, there may be slight variation in colour, and/or craftsmanship. Such variations are inherent in the production of handmade products, so you may expect minor distinctions that will only make your purchase very special and truly one of a kind. Each item is handcrafted with love and passion by our professional in-house floral designer.
